title: Sell Yourself Directly
content: As an independent seller, you find yourself constrained by working capital tied in stock inside Amazon warehouses, and have to deal with the day-to-day challenges that come from selling on the platform.

title: Sell To Amazon
content: By selling directly to Amazon, you are at their mercy. You get unfavorable terms, zero MAP compliance, and no additional services. And good luck getting issues solved quickly.

title: Sell To Average Third Party Seller
content: The average 3P just plain sucks. They are hard to work with, order small quantities, have terrible customer service, and generally donâ€™t care about your brand.

title: Sell to Zoplenti
content: Enter Zoplenti, a partner that always over delivers. We place regular large wholesale orders, and then grow your brand's market share on Amazon while delighting your customers with top-notch customer service. Surpassing expectations is just what we do.
